participant_1.background:
I think it's really cool to be able to build things with your own hands.
my husband died a few years ago , so i am raising them alone.
my favorite pass time is gazing at clouds.
i live in a house in the country.
my desire is to becom a fashion designer.

participant_2.background:
I'm a solitary type and my favorite animal is the cat.
i like watching ufc fights.
i barely show up to work.
I value my memories with my cat more than anything in the world.
My kids are my first priority, so I wake up early to make sure I have time to drive them to their sports events.

content.text: I am doing great! How about you?
Good, thanks. I just got home from work and am relaxing. What do you do for work?
I work as a teacher and I really love it. I've been working there for 10 years now and I can't imagine doing anything else.
That's great! I'm a stay at home mom and I love being with my kids. I want to start my own clothing line one day.
That's awesome! I hope you achieve your dream. I'm a big fan of fashion and I love to watch fashion shows.
What's your favorite thing to do in your free time?
I love to spend time with my family and watch UFC fights. I'm also a big fan of cats and I love to read about them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love to read and I like to watch the clouds too.
Cloud watching is so relaxing! I love to lay in the grass and watch the clouds float by.
That sounds like a perfect way to spend a day. What's your favorite thing about being a teacher?
My favorite thing about being a teacher is seeing the kids learn and grow. It's so rewarding to see them progress and achieve their goals.
That's great! I'm sure you're a great teacher.
